AutomatedActionParameter.name: AutomatedActionParameter
AutomatedActionParameter.description: Represents the values or field references evaluated by the automated action.

DataType.description: The data type of the value or field reference value.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the automated action parameter record is locked or not.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the automated action parameter record can be edited or not.

ParameterName.description: The name of the invocable action parameter the value maps to.

ReferenceField.description: The reference to the field thatâ€™s resolved at runtime. For example, LeadID. If Value has a value, this field is null.

Value.description: The value to be passed to the invocable action parameter at runtime. If ReferenceField has a value, this field is null.
